alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Shackelford; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 11:05PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Callahan, eastern Shackelford and southeastern Throckmorton Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1104 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mccarty Lake, or near Albany, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Albany, Moran, Woodson, Fort Griffin, Ibex, Mccarty Lake, Lusk, Us- 283 Near The Callahan-Shackelford County Line and Us- 180 Near The Shackelford-Stephens County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for west central Texas.
